definitions.definition: A question, an inquiry (US), an enquiry (UK).
definitions.example: The teacher answered the student’s query concerning biosynthesis.

definitions.definition: A set of instructions passed to a database.
definitions.example: The database admin switched on query logging for debugging purposes.

definitions.definition: To question or call into doubt.
To pass a set of instructions to a database to retrieve information from it.
To send a private message to (a user on IRC).
To send out a query letter.
